entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING CLOUDY
PATCHY DENSE FOG THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
